issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Install and launch KitchenSink
2. Navigate to: Base UI>Views>Scroll Views>Basic
3. Press "Add to Scroll View" several times
4. Scroll to the bottom

Actual: Scrolling becomes choppy.
Expected: Scrolling should not become choppy when adding scroll views.

Note: Poor scrolling performance occurs in 1.7.5 as well.
fields.summary: iOS: Scroll Views - Scrolling becomes choppy when adding more Scroll View in KS's Scroll Views Basic test
fields.environment:
SDK build: 1.7.5, 1.8.0.1.v20111212014614
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201112120322
OS: Mac OS X Lion
Device: ipod 3rd Gen (4.0.2)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
